testimonials.text: I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Chirag. I had the pleasure of working with Chirag for one year at the Aspect Ratio. Chirag’s ability to work on multiple projects was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic increase in the productivity level of our company. No matter how tense a meeting, Chirag made sure everyone left with a smile. As a team member, Chirag earns my highest recommendation.
testimonials.user: Abhijeet Lokhande (Data Science Student @Kings College of London (Ex-Advarisk))

testimonials.text: Chirag is wonderful to work with and has exceptional expertise in programming. He is dedicated, self-motivated, methodical and very capable. He is not only a reliable and forward thinking guy but also an inspiring team player.
testimonials.user: Navneet Rajput (Sr. Software Engineer @ Bank of America)
